response.overview: Presented by Voices in Society and Travelers Insurance Indemnity, this untitled PSA-style film from the 1970s is a compilation of various anti-drug use PSAs from National Clearinghouse for Alcohol and Drug Abuse Information (NCADI). The films were assembled by a film collector who did public screenings of cult films; he often showed this compilation under the moniker “Stoner’s Night Out”. NCADI is the information service for the Center for Substance Abuse Prevention of the U.S. Department of Health & Human Services. The PSAs that comprise this film combine footage of drug use as well as interviews. Overall, this film warns of the short-term and long-term effects of drug use with the later segments of the film focusing on marijuana use specifically.

production_companies.name: National Clearinghouse for Alcohol and Drug Abuse Information

response.title: Stoner's Night Out

results.name: "STONER'S NIGHT OUT"  1970s NCADI ANTI-MARIJUANA AND DRUG USE & ABUSE  PSA COMPILATION   MO10024
